name: 陳煒朋
objective:
讓學生了解投資的基本觀念，課程內容主管要介紹證券 (股票、債券)、期貨、選擇權的投資，以及證券的評價模式和 CAPM 等訂價模式說明。驟。
The course helps stdents to understand the knowledge of investment. It includes security. Future option and CAPM Models.
schedule:
Introduction to Investments
Ch1 Investments: Background and Issues
Ch2 Asset Classes and Financial Instruments
Ch3 Securities Markets
Ch4 Mutual Funds and Other Investment Companies
Ch5 Risk, Return, and the Historical Record
Ch6 Efficient Diversification
Ch7 Capital Asset Pricing and Arbitrage Pricing Theory
Midterm Exam (期中考)
Ch8 The Efficient Market Hypothesis
Ch9 Behavioral Finance and Technical Analysis
Ch10 Bond Prices and Yields
Ch11 Managing Bond Portfolios
Ch12 Macroeconomic and Industry Analysis
Ch13 Equity Valuation
Ch14 Financial Statement Analysis
Ch18 Evaluating Investment Performance
Final Exam (期末考)
scorePolicy:
先修基礎：經濟學、會計學、財務管理、(統計學)
評分方式：
期中考 (Midterm Exam)：45%
期末考 (Final Exam)：45%
作業 (Assignment)：10%
materials:
教科書：
Bodie, Z., A. Kane, and A.J. Marcus, (2022), Essentials of Investments (ISE), 12/e, McGraw-Hill. (華泰書局)
參考書：
Bodie, Z., A. Kane, and A.J. Marcus, (2021), Investments, 12/e, McGraw-Hill. (華泰書局)
Bodie, Z., A. Kane, and A.J. Marcus, (2019), Essentials of Investments (ISE), 11/e, McGraw-Hill. (華泰書局)
Bodie, Z., A. Kane, and A.J. Marcus, (2018), Investments, 11/e, McGraw-Hill. (華泰書局)
林哲鵬，謝東昇，2018，投資學：理論與實務，第 11 版。(華泰書局)
姜堯民，2016，財務軟體應用，第五版。(新陸書局)
謝劍平，2020，投資學：基本原理與實務，第八版。(智勝書局)
